metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12958 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In Xpdf 4.01.01, a heap-based buffer over-read could be triggered inFoFiType1C::convertToType0 in fofi/FoFiType1C.cc when it is trying toaccess the second privateDicts array element, because the privateDictsarray has only one element allocated.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
